=== Summary ===
cdrkit is a brand new suite of programs (based on cdrtools) released under GNU GPL.

=== Rationale ===

cdrtools author JÃ¶rg Schilling recently released parts of his software suite for CD burning under <nowiki>[[http://www.opensource.org/licenses/cddl1.php|CDDL license]]</nowiki>, which is incompatible with GNU GPL license, as clearly <nowiki>[[http://www.gnu.org/licenses/license-list.html|stated]]</nowiki> by Free Software Foundation.

So, Debian developers have released a fork of cdrtools suite named <nowiki>[[http://debburn.alioth.debian.org/|cdrkit]]</nowiki> in order to replace Shilling's original software.

=== Scope ===
This specification covers the transition from cdrtools to cdrkit.

=== Implementation ===
This suite is still on heavy development, so we should follow <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?which=pkg&data=cdrkit&archive=no&version=&dist=unstable|Debian cdrkit bug report]]</nowiki> for a while and do a very accurate testing phase before releasing a stable version.
